title: Kwasi Kwarteng – 2021 Comments on Pay as You Grow Repayments
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Kwasi Kwarteng, the Business Secretary, on 8 February 2021.
content:
The comprehensive and generous financial support package we have delivered across the UK has protected jobs, saved businesses and kept local economies on the move.
